Text: All they all (96%+) black and white pics?
Thanks for posting. What size are the majority of the pictures? I would be looking for large hi res pics. Thanks.

The previews were selected by choosing roughly every 36th picture, so it is a pseudo-random, not-mathematically-perfect representative sample.  Most of the pics are black and white.

I believe all pics are either 2000 pixels wide or high, which is the highest resolution available.
